subject: Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
Marathon Running
Chicago Marathon
lead_paragraph: Dennis Kimetto of Kenya won the Chicago Marathon in a course-record 2:03:45, and his compatriot Rita Jeptoo was the women’s winner.
snippet: Dennis Kimetto of Kenya won the Chicago Marathon in a course-record 2:03:45, and his compatriot Rita Jeptoo was the women’s winner.
